scripts.test: npm run test-token && npm run test-native
scripts.test-token: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN CHAIN' && DEBUG=iexec-market-api* CHAINS=TOKEN TOKEN_CHAIN_ID=65535 TOKEN_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC08e9Be37286B7Bbf04875369cf28C21b3F06FCB TOKEN_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://localhost:8545 MONGO_HOST=localhost REDIS_HOST=localhost jest api --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.test-native: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON NATIVE CHAIN' && DEBUG=iexec-market-api* CHAINS=NATIVE NATIVE_CHAIN_ID=65535 NATIVE_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC08e9Be37286B7Bbf04875369cf28C21b3F06FCB NATIVE_IS_NATIVE=true NATIVE_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://localhost:18545 MONGO_HOST=localhost REDIS_HOST=localhost jest api --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.ci-test-token: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN CHAIN' && CHAINS=TOKEN TOKEN_CHAIN_ID=65535 TOKEN_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC08e9Be37286B7Bbf04875369cf28C21b3F06FCB TOKEN_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://chain-token:8545 MONGO_HOST=mongo REDIS_HOST=redis jest api --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.ci-test-native: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON NATIVE CHAIN' && CHAINS=NATIVE NATIVE_CHAIN_ID=65535 NATIVE_IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC08e9Be37286B7Bbf04875369cf28C21b3F06FCB NATIVE_IS_NATIVE=true NATIVE_ETH_RPC_HOST=http://chain-native:8545 MONGO_HOST=mongo REDIS_HOST=redis jest api --coverage --runInBand --forceExit
